import{useEffect,useState,useMemo}from"react";import{motion,AnimatePresence}from"framer-motion";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function WelcomeOverlay(){const[visible,setVisible]=useState(true);const techSymbols=useMemo(()=>Array.from({length:25},()=>({icon:getRandomTech(),left:`${Math.random()*100}%`,top:`${Math.random()*100}%`,duration:4+Math.random()*3,delay:Math.random()*2})),[]);useEffect(()=>{const timer=setTimeout(()=>setVisible(false),3500);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatePresence,{children:visible&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black/90 backdrop-blur-sm",initial:{opacity:0},animate:{opacity:1},exit:{opacity:0},transition:{duration:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute inset-0 overflow-hidden pointer-events-none",children:techSymbols.map((symbol,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.span,{className:"absolute text-blue-400 dark:text-green-400 text-xs md:text-base font-mono",style:{left:symbol.left,top:symbol.top},animate:{y:[-100,800]},transition:{repeat:Infinity,repeatType:"loop",duration:symbol.duration,delay:symbol.delay},children:symbol.icon},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"relative text-center text-white px-6 py-8 rounded-xl",initial:{scale:0.9,opacity:0},animate:{scale:1,opacity:1},exit:{scale:0.8,opacity:0},transition:{duration:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight",children:"Welcome to My Portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg md:text-xl mt-4",children:"I'm Mohammad Rajabi \u2013 Web Developer & Problem Solver"})]})]})});}// Helper to randomize tech tags/icons
function getRandomTech(){const tech=["<HTML>","<CSS>","<JS>","<REACT>","<NODE>","<TAILWIND>","<GIT>","<SQL>","<FLUTTER>","<FIREBASE>","<API>","<UI/UX>","<SASS>","<MONGO>","<NEXT>","<TYPESCRIPT>"];return tech[Math.floor(Math.random()*tech.length)];}
